Product Name: Men's Pullover Sweater Jumper Zip Sweater Polo Sweater Zip Collar Retro Vintage Casual Party Evening Wear Daily Embroidered Knitting Warm Long Sleeve Fall Winter Black Army Green Brown
Highlights: ["[Fabric:] This men's pullover sweater is crafted from a high-quality blend, featuring 6.5% wool, 20.6% cotton fiber, 28.3% polyester, and 44.6% acrylic fibers. The combination ensures warmth and durability, making it an excellent choice for fall and winter seasons. The fabric's soft-knit texture along with a ribbed knit style adds sophistication and enhances the overall appearance.", '[Fit:] Designed with a regular fit, this sweater offers ample movement and a comfortable wearing experience. Whether worn for daily activities or evening parties, it pairs perfectly with jeans or chinos for a complete look, making it a versatile wardrobe essential.', '[Size Range:] Available in sizes M, L, XL, and XXL, this pullover accommodates a wide range of body types, ensuring a proper fit for adults seeking comfort and style during the colder months.']
